verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> [to] <S%H4318>Micah<s%> of <S%H4183>Moresheth<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3147>Jotham,<s%> <S%H271>Ahaz,<s%> [and] <S%H2396>Hezekiah,<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H2372>saw<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

<S%H8085>Hear,<s%> O <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of you; <S%H7181>Listen,<s%> O <S%H776>earth<s%> and <S%H4393>all<s%> it <S%H4393>contains,<s%> And let the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God<s%> be a <S%H5707>witness<s%> against you, The <S%H136>Lord<s%> from His <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1964>temple.<s%>

For <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H3318>coming<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> from His <S%H4725>place.<s%> He will <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> and <S%H1869>tread<s%> on the <S%H1116>high<s%> <S%H1116>places<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

The <S%H2022>mountains<s%> will <S%H4549>melt<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> Him, And the <S%H6010>valleys<s%> will be <S%H1234>split,<s%> Like <S%H1749>wax<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H784>fire,<s%> Like <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H5064>poured<s%> <S%H5064>down<s%> a <S%H4174>steep<s%> <S%H4174>place.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> is for the <S%H6588>rebellion<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> And for the <S%H9128>sins<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> <S%H4310>What<s%> is the <S%H6588>rebellion<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>? Is it not <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>? <S%H4310>What<s%> is the <S%H1116>high<s%> <S%H1116>place<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>? Is it not <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>?

For I will <S%H7760>make<s%> <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> a <S%H5856>heap<s%> of <S%H5856>ruins<s%> in the open <S%H7704>country,<s%> <S%H4302>Planting<s%> <S%H4302>places<s%> for a <S%H3754>vineyard.<s%> I will <S%H5064>pour<s%> her <S%H68>stones<s%> <S%H5064>down<s%> into the <S%H1516>valley,<s%> And will <S%H1540>lay<s%> <S%H1540>bare<s%> her <S%H3247>foundations.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> of her <S%H6456>idols<s%> will be <S%H3807>smashed,<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> of her <S%H868>earnings<s%> will be <S%H8313>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire,<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> of her <S%H6091>images<s%> I will <S%H7760>make<s%> <S%H8077>desolate,<s%> For she <S%H6908>collected<s%> [them] from a <S%H2181>harlot<s%>'s <S%H868>earnings,<s%> And to the <S%H868>earnings<s%> of a harlot they will <S%H7725>return.<s%>

<S%H5921>Because<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> I must <S%H5594>lament<s%> and <S%H3213>wail,<s%> I must <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H7758>barefoot<s%> and <S%H6174>naked;<s%> I must <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H4553>lament<s%> like the <S%H8565>jackals<s%> And a <S%H60>mourning<s%> like the <S%H3284>ostriches.<s%>

For her <S%H4347>wound<s%> is <S%H605>incurable,<s%> For it has <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H3063>Judah;<s%> It has <S%H5060>reached<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of my <S%H5971>people,<s%> [Even] to <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>
<S%H5046>Tell<s%> it not in <S%H1661>Gath,<s%> <S%H1058>Weep<s%> not at <S%H1058>all.<s%> At Beth-le-aphrah <S%H6428>roll<s%> yourself in the <S%H6083>dust.<s%>

<S%H5674>Go<s%> on your <S%H5674>way,<s%> <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> of <S%H8208>Shaphir,<s%> in <S%H1322>shameful<s%> <S%H6181>nakedness.<s%> The <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> of <S%H6630>Zaanan<s%> does not <S%H3318>escape.<s%> The <S%H4553>lamentation<s%> of Beth-ezel: "He will <S%H3947>take<s%> from you its <S%H5979>support.<s%>"

For the <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> of <S%H4796>Maroth<s%> <S%H9123>Becomes<s%> <S%H2470>weak<s%> <S%H9123>waiting<s%> for <S%H9185>good,<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> a <S%H9563>calamity<s%> has <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> To the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

<S%H7573>Harness<s%> the <S%H4818>chariot<s%> to the team of <S%H7409>horses,<s%> O <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> of <S%H3923>Lachish<s%> – She was the <S%H7225>beginning<s%> of <S%H9128>sin<s%> To the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%> – <S%H3588>Because<s%> in you were <S%H4672>found<s%> The <S%H6588>rebellious<s%> <S%H6588>acts<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore,<s%> you will <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H7964>parting<s%> <S%H7964>gifts<s%> On <S%H5921>behalf<s%> of Moresheth-gath; The <S%H1004>houses<s%> of <S%H392>Achzib<s%> [will] become a <S%H391>deception<s%> To the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H5750>Moreover,<s%> I will <S%H935>bring<s%> on you The one who <S%H3423>takes<s%> <S%H3423>possession,<s%> O <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> of <S%H4762>Mareshah.<s%> The <S%H9202>glory<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> will <S%H935>enter<s%> <S%H5725>Adullam.<s%>

<S%H7139>Make<s%> yourself <S%H7139>bald<s%> and <S%H1494>cut<s%> <S%H1494>off<s%> your <S%H1494>hair,<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of your <S%H8588>delight;<s%> <S%H7337>Extend<s%> your <S%H7144>baldness<s%> like the <S%H5404>eagle,<s%> For they will <S%H1540>go<s%> from you into <S%H1540>exile.<s%>
